solution_line_template: The total amount of money from washing cars is {cars_washed} * ${money_per_car} = $<<{cars_washed}*{money_per_car}={money_from_cars}>>{money_from_cars}
The total amount of money from mowing lawns {lawns_mowed} * ${money_per_lawn} = $<<{lawns_mowed}*{money_per_lawn}={money_from_lawns}>>{money_from_lawns}
The total amount of money Stormi makes is ${money_from_cars} + ${money_from_lawns} = $<<{money_from_cars}+{money_from_lawns}={total_money}>>{total_money}
